article_title: Highway up Mt Lemmon back open following crash
article_text:
General Hitchcock Highway has reopened after a crash. According to the Pima County Sheriff's Department, a vehicle hit a motorcycle Saturday afternoon causing a lane closure.

The northbound lane was closed at mile post 15.

PCSD volunteers were on site to direct traffic. The closure did not last very long.

Those involved in the wreck are expected to recover.
